waitReview: Please wait patiently during the review
youInNoCompany: You have not joined any company
needAdminAgree: Withdrawal from the company requires the consent of the company administrator
contact2Quit: Contact the administrator to apply for withdrawal
retainAllContent: Keep all the contents of the employee's card
clearMirror: Withdrawal from the company and clean up the copy content
clearCompanyMirror: Withdrawal from the company and clean up all content copied from main card
clearLinkAndPage: Withdrawal from the company and clean all Micro Link and Micro Page
clearAllLinkAndPage: Withdrawal from the company and clean all Micro Link and Micro Page(Including your own creation)
warn: It can not be recovered after deletion!
confirmQuit: Confirm the application to withdraw from the company?
warn1: It can not be recovered after deletion!
inputSearchCompany: Please search for the company to join
submitDataError: Submit data error,please refresh and try again

companyCannotAdd: The company is prohibited to add staff!
closeMirror2Join: Company require the card to close the copy button before joining!
afterJoin: After join the {{companyName}},the company administrators have the right to delete employees and have the right to delete some or all content of your cards.
